casebody.data:
CHAMBERS
v.
TRANSIT MANAGEMENT. No. 527A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. John Brem Smith, Charlotte, Jennifer Ingram Mitchell, M. Duane Jones, for Transit Management. John F. Ayers, III, Charlotte, for Hubert Chambers. Samuel A. Scudder, S. Neal Camak, George W. Lennon, Charles R. Hassell, Jr., Raleigh, for Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of January 2006 by Plaintiff to Amend New Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
